name: Weary Eerie Way
description:
What a nightmare! You're downed in Blimp-Limp Bay, trying to escape  the fearsome Cull-Say-Skull. You'll have to do a lot of running away to find what you need.

Of course, if you don't, and you just wake up from your dream, that's okay, too. But it's the principle of the thing!

This is an entry to EctoComp 2021, the Petite Mort division. It was created in just under 4 hours. The source control is here.
